name: Lone Pilot (V)
Lore: 'One lone TIE fighter, acting as a scout near the Death Star, suddenly encountered the Millennium Falcon.',
Text: 'USED: Activate 1 Force.STARTING: Take into hand from Reserve Deck Bossk, Dengar, DS-61-2, Guri or Juno Eclipse (may also take into hand from Reserve Deck a matching starship, a system with exactly 1 [Dark Side Force], and an always [Immune to Alter] Effect). When drawing your starting hand, draw four cards instead of eight. Place this Interrupt in Lost Pile.',
